revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=widemac |model=SL-R7205 |revision=(XDX-RN502J) |est_release_date=05/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed=384 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320EBTI-70G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9812G6JH-6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J2,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;2.6.21; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:13:13 |oui_eth=00:13:13 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N300 AP/Router}}
"XDX-RN502J V2.0" and "1022" is silkscreened on the board.
The manufacturer of this device is almost certainly [http://sztianhao.com Shenzhen Century Xinyang Technology Co., Ltd]. :They probably sold this under various brands, [https://www.etradeasia.com/supplier-271828/Shenzhen-Century-Xinyang-Tech-Co-Ltd.html perhaps including widemac, Skylink, Tianhao, and Blueway]. '''widemac''' is the primary brand used by this company<!-- AFAICT -->, the brand primarily used on their web site, and is synonymous with this manufacturer.
As this board is used by numerous sub-models from this company, this is kind of a catch-all entry for them.
===Rebrands and similar products=== * The Bococom TH-R300W board shares the same board text. * This device shares the same board ID as the [[DealExtreme 92141]]. * The text on the board ("XDX-RN502J") is similar to text on the [[Winstars WS-WR511N1]], which is almost certainly another '''widemac''' product. * For '''widemac''' products, the '''SL''' / '''WD''' [https://web.archive.org/web/20160806201540/http://sztianhao.com/prodetial.php?id=134 R7201], [https://web.archive.org/web/20160806142835/http://sztianhao.com/prodetial.php?id=132 R7202], and [https://web.archive.org/web/20160806143120/http://sztianhao.com/prodetial.php?id=133 R7203] likely share similar boards. *The [https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/widemac/sl-r7205 OpenWrt wiki] entry notes the R7205 as using this board (Aceex 22NRY, CD-R King 3G-52). * The [https://wiki.reseaulibre.ca/hardware/routers/ '''Resau Libre''' wiki] notes the R7205 as using a board silkscreened with "XDX-RN502J".
===Additional external links=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/widemac/sl-r7205 "Widemac SL-R720X" on the OpenWrt wiki] (<small>[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/unbranded/xdx-rn502j Previously on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki here]</small>) *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=158105 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=82160 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] (w/ images) *[https://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=61162 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums again] *[https://wiki.reseaulibre.ca/hardware/routers/ On the '''Reseau Libre''' wiki] :[[SkyLink SL-R7205 (XDX-RN502J)]] (Widemac) :[[SkyLink SL-R7206 (XDX-RN502R)]] (Widemac) - [http://wiki.reseaulibre.ca/hardware/routers/Bococom-DWR150/ ''Bococom DWR-150'']
